item.description: Ice skating! Free outdoor show at the Kendall Square Community Skating Rink, near Kendall Red Line T stop. The show is about a half-hour performance by accomplished local competitors and coaches. They usually serve free hot cider or cocoa and there is a cash snack bar. The show is free, dress warmly to stand outside. Afterward, you can rent ice skates to try your self, or bring your own to skate. (maybe $5-8) Some of the performers stay so you might get some advice! My sister is the director and also performs, she is amazing by the way! :) This is not a conversation Meetup, just a fun social event to welcome Winter! Hope to see you there! https://www.facebook....

group.name: The Boston English as a Second Language Meetup Group

item.name: Off-topic: Kendall Rink Opening Show (free, outdoors)
